data.eml:eml: The family Plectopylidae (Gastropoda, Pulmonata) in Laos with the description of two new genera and a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pall-Gergely, Barna, Muratov, Igor V., Asami, Takahiro (2016): The family Plectopylidae (Gastropoda, Pulmonata) in Laos with the description of two new genera and a new species. ZooKeys 592: 1-26, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.592.8118, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.592.8118
